Reviews.Content: live nyc takes san francisco 4 times ive stayed luxury hotel city past couple ive staying exclusively vitale water view exquisite theres waking peering water ive upgraded times circular suite short breathtaking staff especially concierges helpful service delicious plus hotel spotless stay friday night visit farmers market ferry building saturday morning couldnt recommend hotel highly
